definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)
to do sth for show/to keep up appearances
shapeless/deformed/ruined/beyond recognition/(of a person) reduced to a shadow

sentences.english: And you express that "I'm feeling this way, is it ok?"
sentences.chinese: 你可以表达“我有这样子的感觉，没问题吧？”

sentences.english: I wondered if this was really what post-collegiate life was supposed to be like.
sentences.chinese: 我不知道是否大学毕业后的生活就真是这个样子。

sentences.english: I thought he was really hurt but he was faking .
sentences.chinese: 我以为他真的受了伤，而他只是在装样子。

sentences.english: It was just his vulgar way of showing off.
sentences.chinese: 那样子就像歌唱演员表演似的，完全是庸俗的炫耀。

sentences.english: I cannot visualize what he looked like.
sentences.chinese: 我想像不出他是什么样子。

sentences.english: Thermite effects changed to look like it is burning for several seconds before causing damage.
sentences.chinese: 铝热效应改变的样子是前几秒钟燃烧造成的损害。

sentences.english: They sprinkle their cheese on top and make happy faces with their pepperoni.
sentences.chinese: 他们在表面上撒上奶酪，把香肠摆成笑脸的样子。

sentences.english: Let me take your measurements first. You can come and try it on in three days.
sentences.chinese: 我先给你量一下尺寸，三天以后来试样子。

sentences.english: Gorillas are very fierce-looking, with broad shoulders, powerful arms, and pointed teeth.
sentences.chinese: 狒狒样子凶猛，肩膀宽阔，手臂很长，牙齿尖锐。

sentences.english: He did not want to think of the mutilated under-side of the fish.
sentences.chinese: 他不愿想象鱼腹下面残缺的样子。

sentences.english: Mistry’s model won’t be the last.
sentences.chinese: Mistry的模型不会是最终的样子。

sentences.english: I don't like your pert way of speaking.
sentences.chinese: 我不喜欢你那说话没礼貌的样子。

sentences.english: How will the future be like?
They make believe to be generous, but they gave him only two-pence.
sentences.chinese: 他们装出十分慷慨的样子，但只给了两便士。

sentences.english: The model is an odd-looking structure of balls and rods.
sentences.chinese: 这个模型是由球和杆组成的结构，样子很奇特。

sentences.english: Attempt to do me awake all the way, Xinxin Ran opened his eyes.
sentences.chinese: 一切都像刚睡醒的样子，欣欣然张开了眼。

definition: seemingly/apparently/looks as if/appear to be/gives the impression that/seems on the face of it to be
to feel/to become aware of/feeling/sense/perception/CL:個|个[ge4]
interjection or grunt of agreement/uhm/Ah, OK/expression of recognition/Oh, it's you!
modal particle ending sentence, showing affirmation, approval, or consent
interjection expressing doubt or requiring answer/Eh?/what?
interjection of surprise or doubt/Eh?/My!/what's up?

that one/that thing/that (as opposed to this)/(used before a verb or adjective for emphasis)/(used to humorously or indirectly refer to sth embarrassing, funny etc, or when one can't think of the right word)/(used in speech as a filler, similar to "umm", "you know" etc)/(euph.) menstruation/sex/also pr. [nei4 ge5]
(particle equivalent to 啊 after a vowel, expressing surprise or doubt)
(modal particle indicating suggestion or surmise)/...right?/...OK?/...I presume.
bar (loanword) (serving drinks, or providing Internet access etc)/to puff (on a pipe etc)/(onom.) bang/abbr. for 貼吧|贴吧[tie1 ba1]
is or isn't/yes or no/whether or not
that/that kind of/that sort of/that type of
